title: The Study
intro: You are in a small study with a locked wooden door and a single painting.

objects.name: wooden door
objects.inspect_text: A heavy wooden door with a keypad lock. It looks like you need a three-digit code.

lock.on_success_text: You hear a click as the lock opens. The door swings outward. You have escaped!
lock.on_failure_text: The keypad flashes red. That code is incorrect.

objects.name: framed painting
objects.inspect_text: Behind the painting you find a note: 'The code is 400 + 19.'
